name: Luisa
greetingText: It's been a quite long time we didn't see each other...
wishText: May the happiness and luck be with you forever ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeeeaaaa!! WISH YOU ENDLESS HAPPINESS ON YOUR SPECIAL DAY!!!
text2: That's what I was going to say.
text3: But there is something else I want to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
